article: Every year the Greens go to the beach for a week ' s vacation . There are many interesting things to do at the beach . The children play games on the sand . Sometimes they build sandcastles . There are saltwater swimming pools . The children can swim safely in these pools and the water is always clean . There is an esplanade . This is a long road by the beach . There are many cafes and restaurants on the esplanade . There is also a park beside ( . . . . . . ) the beach . This is a place that many people like to go to . The Greens always stay at the same hotel . They usually have the same rooms . These rooms are at the front of the hotel . There is a good _ of the sea from their windows . The children are a little sad when the vacation is over because they do n ' t want to leave .
questions: According to the story , which of the following is TRUE ?

model: the greens stay in the rooms at the front of the hotel .
the children usually play games on the sand .
you can have the same rooms at the front of the hotel .
they usually live in the same room .
human: If they want to see the sea , they must go to the beach .
They wo n ' t go to the beach next year .
There are no restaurants by the beach .
The Greens stay in the rooms at the front of the hotel .
